mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(payment_no, imp_uid, merchant_uid, amount, pay_method, pg, apply_num, buyer_name, buyer_tel, paid_at, status, res_id, company_name, meeting_no, u_id) VALUES (payment_no_seq.nextval(), #{imp_uid}, #{mercharnt_uid}, #{amount}, #{pay_method}, #{pg}, #{apply_num}, #{buyer_name}, #{buyer_tel}, #{paid_at}, #{status}, #{res_id}, #{company_name}, #{u_id})
